name: Chibo: The Game
description:
Welcome to Chibo: The Game
This game is all about raising your own monster called a Chibo, so it can fight in a tournament known as the 'final battles'.

You can raise your Chibo by playing mini-games and watch it evolve when its stats increase high enough. Each Chibo can evolve twice, and what they evolve into depends on what stat they are good at.

You want to raise your Chibo by participating in mini-games first, because if a Chibo fails in battle, it dies permanently. So be careful out there!

This game was made for the GBJam8, a game jam all about making a game with a few of the restrictions on the original GameBoy. If you could rate this game after playing that would be highly appreciated.
